description:
Ren, someone who couldn`t understand true love, couldn`t even be satisfied after receiving advice from a monk.  Even though he did not understand love, he was conscious of the fact that his head was full of thoughts and took on some shocks. On the other hand, Kyoko, who was looking forward to his return, had already decided to go see him. The moment she appeared in front of his eyes, Ren`s unexpected feelings began to pour out...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: And So the Door Was Opened
